title: Welcome to the Community!
body: This is the first post. Feel free to engage and share your thoughts.

replies.body: Same here! Looking forward to great discussions.

title: React vs Angular vs Vue
body: Which framework do you prefer for frontend development and why?

comments.body: I prefer React for its ecosystem and community support.

title: Best Practices in TypeScript
body: What are your favorite tips for writing clean and maintainable TypeScript code?

title: CSS Modules or Styled Components?
body: Which do you find more effective for styling React applications?

comments.body: CSS Modules are great for simple projects, but Styled Components shine in larger apps.

title: Favorite Programming Resources
body: Share your go-to resources for learning programming!

title: The Rise of AI in Development
body: How do you see AI impacting software development in the next 5 years?

title: Your Favorite Text Editor
body: Are you a VS Code fan, or do you swear by another editor?

comments.body: VS Code all the way! Love the extensions.

replies.body: Agreed! The Prettier and ESLint extensions are lifesavers.

title: What's Your Favorite Algorithm?
body: Which algorithm do you find fascinating, and why?

title: Debugging Tips
body: What techniques or tools do you use to debug complex issues?

comments.body: I find using breakpoints in Chrome DevTools incredibly helpful.

title: Open Source Contributions
body: Have you contributed to open source? Share your experience!

comments.body: I contributed to a documentation update for React. Felt great!
